text: The 2017 Zhengzhou Women's Tennis Open was a professional tennis tournament played on indoor hard courts. It was the fourth edition of the tournament and part of the 2017 WTA 125K series, offering a total of $125,000 in prize money. It took place in Zhengzhou, China, on 17–23 April 2017. ==Singles main draw entrants== === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Peng Shuai, 3–6, 7–6(7–3), 1–1 ret. ===Doubles=== * Han Xinyun / Zhu Lin def. Jacqueline Cako / Julia Glushko, 7–5, 6–1 == External links == * * Official website Category:2017 WTA 125K series Category:2017 in Chinese sport Category:Tennis tournaments in China
